tldr: The `github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go` package is no longer maintained, as indicated by AWS. Its last commit documents that `github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go` has served its purpose and will no longer receive updates.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go` package from your application. Please take a look at github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2 instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
